reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: I started converting my house to a smart house to fulfill my itch to tinker. My wife, on the other hand, was not that thrilled about having to use a voice assistant or her phone to control the lights. That's where these bad boys come in handy. The switches worked super well with home assistant and I was able to configure them to work the lights in the various rooms so that she can just use the remote and be happy. It has worked wonders! Very happy.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2025
reviews.title: Very happy with the remote switch

reviews.text: This remote works great and is quite convenient to use with the hue light system when you don't want to bother with the app. Keeping the remote in the holder makes it into a dimming light switch that you can keep on the wall. It synced easily and can be set to work with multiple lights.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2025
reviews.title: Great addition to the hue lighting system

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: Love the Hue Lights. Hate their switch infrastructure. Why they refuse to allow or certify lights that actually work with your existing home wiring is beyond me. I tried this one for a while and it does control the Hue lights but you need to hardwire the circuit on. Also the magnet is crap. In our Kitchen the "remote" keeps getting bumped and knocked out of the cradle. And it needs batteries. I have recently gone with Inovelli Smart Dimmers to control my Hue lights and my "dumb" bulbs in Chandeliers.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2025
reviews.title: Needs batteries and hard wiring. Magnet is terrible

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: Do not buy!!! Horrible customer service (that was sent overseas). I have around 48 lights. The bridge stopped working and I called to troubleshoot. The Tech support person literally read word for word from their website to troubleshoot. I told them that I already tried their suggestions and they didn’t work. The person on the phone we needed to try again. In the end I hung up. It’s sad that I spent all this money on their lights and now their tech support team can’t even get them working.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2025
reviews.title: Spend your money on something cheaper and more reliable

It took me a bit to figure out, you have to go throught the Hue Phillips App on phone, but once done it works through the WIFI.

reviews.title: Helpful

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: I absolutely love the Philips Hue Dimmer Switch! It’s sleek, intuitive, and a total game-changer for smart lighting. The setup was a breeze and literally took just a few minutes, no complicated wiring. The responsiveness is flawless, and I can effortlessly adjust the lighting to set the perfect mood, whether I want cozy ambiance or bright, energizing light. One of my favorite features is the ability to control multiple lights at once with a single click, and the custom preset options are a dream, perfect for any activity, from reading to movie nights. Plus, the switch is battery-powered, so there’s no need to worry about complicated installations or power outlets. If you’re looking to enhance your Philips Hue experience, this dimmer switch is an absolute must-have!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2024
reviews.title: "Transform Your Space with the Philips Hue Dimmer Switch – A Game Changer!"

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: Thought it might be helpful to clarify two points that confused me about this listing. Firstly, there is another (more expensive) listing that makes it look like there is another version of this device (dimmer switch) that does work without a Hue bridge while this one must be used with a bridge. Both of these are untrue. I can attest that this device can indeed control Hue lights directly via bluetooth. The control might be a bit more limiting than with the bridge, but I haven't found it to be a problem at all. Additionally, from my research, there is only one version of this device so you might as well buy it off the cheaper listing. The Philips documentation could definitely be better as to pairing without a bridge, but I think most people will be able to get there. Once paired, I've been quite pleased with the set in operation.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2024
reviews.title: Works without a bridge!

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: I really like the Phillips HUE products and this switch, but it is hard to setup with the HUE software. The software has some bugs where I wasn't able to save my settings due to an error. Also, it seems to only remember the default light settings where I'm not able to program my custom color settings that are in the HUE software. If it does allow this, it is just hard to get it to work. Again, having the switch is great, I just with Phillips would debug there software, plus make it easier to program the themes easier.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2024
reviews.title: I like the concept but the software needs inprovment

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: As long as you have the job, this works great for Alexa, when when using other bulbs! It would be nice to have double presses, and I wish Alexa routines would allow for lowering and raising brightness by a certain amount instead of changing to a set amount, one of which I hope Philips sees as feedback and changes and the other I hope for Amazon to see. That small critique aside, it's great to have a generic switch that can be used for anything! I'm not a big fan of having to have a hub, but of all hubs to get Philips Hue is probably the most well-known to go for anyway. 10/10 recommend this product for triggering Alexa Routines using matter!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2024
reviews.title: Works Great for Alexa!

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: I have several of the older style hue dimmers.. one started alerting for a quickly dying battery even after changing batteries and even brands. But the bullet and purchased new.. This product is horrible, for starts I couldn’t get the back off, husband finally got a large screwdriver but damage to the plastic from the companies (use a quarter) directions did not work. Got it set up but now the consumer is being forced to use the Hue ugly oversized plate. Photos show how my older version hung nicely on my plate that I had magnetized. This one has something internally which is causing it to repel the magnet, forcing it to turn at an angle which is totally unacceptable. Why do companies feel the need to screw up what were good products.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2024
reviews.title: Not an Improvement

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: Our new home was wired as we would have not choose. The light switch to the master ceiling fan was to the left and on the wall just past where the door ends. The wall to the right had space for a single switch and is where the most traffic is. It is great to be able to easily turn the ceiling fan and light on and off from a more practical location. I highly recommend this product if you are in the market for a simpler, more practical location for a light switch. It is very light weight and easy to install.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2024
reviews.title: This product made life simpler!

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: I have four version 1 Philips Hue dimmer switches. They work great and come with a magnet backed base plate. This version 2 dimmer has a couple of design changes. The V1 on switch now functions as an on/off switch. The V1 off swith is now designated for Scenes and will cycle through them with each press. The base plate is slightly larger on this version than the V1 ( New swith also has rounded corners - which means you can't use old V1 wallplates with V2 switches ). Even though the Philips website claims the wallplates will connect to magnetic surfaces e.g. fridges. The V2 does not have magnets. It only has peel off adhesive strips. If it still had magnets it would get 5 stars. Devices is great. The design is lacking.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2024
reviews.title: Works with any Hue compatible lights

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: After using numerous smart lighting options from different manufacturers it's clear that Philips Hue is above & beyond all others for ease & reliability. Aside from the outrageous cost of the sync box, almost everything is worth paying a little more for. Then I got this V2 dimmer switch. Works well like all other hue devices except for one glaring issue. Apparently Philips thought it would be a good idea to remap the buttons with no apparent way to change that. So now when I want to turn off my dimmed lights I press the bottom button like on my other 4 switches & I'm drowning in lighting at it's brightest setting. Trying to remember which version switch I'm using is annoying to the point that I will try to find an old V1 switch and return this. My question to Philips - is this a ploy to frustrate your customers into upgrading all their dimmer switches? Please fix this.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2024
reviews.title: There's a serious flaw

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: I've found Hue products to be very good. The Hue dimmer switch is no exception. Add this to a room for guests (easier to use than a voice assistant) or just to have another option for controlling your lights. The power on/off and Hue bottons are also highly configurable. I've setup the on/off button to control a room and the hue button to turn on/off all lights on the same floor. By default the hue button is set to change scenes.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2024
reviews.title: Great product!

reviews.text: These switches are easy to set up (we use Home Assistant) and infinitely flexible. They can stay on the wall, but they're also portable. We can also control the lights on our phones, but these are easy for guests to use. They're a serious upgrade to our smart home controls!

reviews.title: Perfect!!

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: The Hue Smart Dimmer Wireless Switch is a fantastic addition to my home. Installation is a breeze, allowing me to place it anywhere I need. I have mine installed upstairs, controlling a Hue flood light downstairs. The detachable remote is incredibly convenient—I can take it outside with me when I take the dog out, giving me full control of the light. This switch has truly enhanced the functionality and convenience of my lighting setup.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2024
reviews.title: So easy!

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: Have multiple ones around the apartment. These are great as you can set them for different scenes for different rooms. Makes it very easy to control your lights without a phone or voice device. These stick to the wall so no installation required. The switch can come out of the casing to be used as a remote control for the lights. Highly recommended for any user of Hue Lights.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2024
reviews.title: Love These

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: Setting up in the hue app is easy, although I with the customization options were a bit more robust. It works reliably but sometimes you need to double press the button for it to register, which is a mild nuisance. I like that it magnetizes to its wall holder so you can pick it up off the wall, but overall I would expect a more polished experience on the software and function side given how expensive this product and Phillips Hue are as a whole.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2024
reviews.title: Functional, but a bit disappointing

reviews.productTitle: Philips Hue Smart Dimmer Switch with Remote, White - 1 Pack - Turns Hue Lights On, Off, Dims or Brightens - Requires Hue Bridge - Easy, No-Wire Installation
reviews.text: These switches work, the battery lasts a long time, etc. They're also pretty much the only option if you want a physical switch to work with your hue lights, so it's not like you have a choice anyway. That said, after using them for a few months, the user experience is one of the worst I've ever seen in a tech product. Together with the app, they were clearly designed by someone who has never used a standard light switch before. One example, when configuring the "on/off" button on the top, you can either have it so a button press turns the lights on, OR turns the lights off. ***there's no way to do both!!*** The whole reason I bought these was to avoid having to fumble with my phone all the time to manage lights, but so far I've spent just as much time trying to force their square peg into a round hole. Altogether an endlessly frustrating product, but unfortunately still pretty much the only option.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2024
reviews.title: Works, but extremely frustrating
